title: Long Covid Basics
content:
Each approach helps CDC and its partners better understand Long COVID and how healthcare providers can treat or support patients living with these long-term effects. CDC posts data on Long COVID and provides analyses. The most recent CDC data and analyses on Long COVID can be found on the
U.S. Census Bureau's Household Pulse Survey
. CDC will continue to share information with healthcare providers to help them evaluate and manage these conditions.
Keep Reading:
CDC Science behind Long COVID
